projects.title: Fuity Board
projects.short_desc: Upload pictures with fruits, filter them with google API, add comments

desc.title: Fruity Board
desc.text: In this project I've used Vue.js for the first time. Inspiration came with love for colors, taste and beautiful symmetrical patterns of fruits. Main conception was to give opportunity to share images where is at least one visible random fruit. Uploaded Pictures are filtered with help of the Google API, pictures without fruits are rejected. Uploading pictures you can add: title, author, tags and description.

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: To build a frontend I used pure HTML/CSS.

desc.title: Backend
desc.text: Backend was build with PostgreSQL for database and Node.js with Express server for the rest. Uploaded pictures are sent to AWS S3, in database are stored only URLs. When the picture is rejected you can see the message.

desc.title: Routing
desc.text: To navigate to different sites I'm using Hash-Routing, so selected picture can be send to someone with URL.

desc.title: Interaction
desc.text: Click on the picture to make picture bigger and read comments. Now you can add comments using your own nick :) You can also navigate through pictures using left and right arrows and X for closing the modal.
